content: baby ombre designed by richard boxhall top of the cedars make your baby the coolest kid in town with this simple ombre baby hat this is a baby version of adult hat ombre with a twist fit one size hat is made 30cm circumference to fit babies newborn to 12 months yarn hat is made with fingering yarn a dark 15g / 53m / 57yds b light 15g / 53m / 57yds suggested yarn two shades of superwash fingering yarn that can be knit to gauge needles 2 5mm us 1 5 circular or double pointed knitting needles 3mm us 2 5 circular or double pointed knitting needles tapestry needle gauge 28 stitches = 10cm in stockinette stitch instructions 1 using 2 5mm needles cast on 84 stitches with dark yarn join in the round being careful not to twist the stitches 2 knit ribbing either 1k 1p or 2k 2p and continue until ribbing measures 3cm or 6cm for folded brim 3 with 3mm needles or size required for gauge place marker at start of round and knit chart chart is repeated 28x per round 4 after completing chart i e row 25 with light yarn decrease as follows round 1 knit 12 knit 2 together repeat to end of round 78 stitches round 2 knit round round 3 knit 11 knit 2 together repeat to end of round 72 stitches round 4 knit round round 5 knit 10 knit 2 together repeat to end of round 66 stitches round 7 knit 9 knit 2 together repeat to end of round 60 stitches continue to decrease every round until 12 stitches remain round 15 5 cut the yarn leaving a long tail thread the tail through the remaining stitches and pull tight to close the top of the hat block and dry in shape finally weave in the ends and your hat is ready to wear top tip if you want to knit from light to dark just knit the chart upside down if it helps avoid confusion 3 2 1 24 1 1 24 23 1 1 1 23 22 1 1 1 22 21 1 21 20 1 1 1 20 19 1 1 1 19 18 1 18 17 1 1 17 16 1 1 1 16 15 15 14 1 1 14 13 1 1 1 13 12 12 11 1 11 10 1 1 1 10 9 9 8 1 8 28 7 1 1 7 6 6 5 5 4 1 1 4 3 3 2 2 1 1 1 3 2 1
